price: ከእናንተም ውስጥ በእርግጥ (ከዘመቻ) ወደ ኋላ የሚንጓደድ ሰው አልለ፡፡ አደጋም ብታገኛችሁ ከእነሱ ጋር ተጣጅ ባልኾንኩ ጊዜ አላህ በእኔ ላይ በእርግጥ ለገሰልኝ ይላል፡፡
arabic: وَإِنَّ مِنكُمۡ لَمَن لَّيُبَطِّئَنَّ فَإِنۡ أَصَٰبَتۡكُم مُّصِيبَةٞ قَالَ قَدۡ أَنۡعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيَّ إِذۡ لَمۡ أَكُن مَّعَهُمۡ شَهِيدٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna minkum laman layubaṭṭi-anna fa-in aṣābatkum muṣībatun qāla qad anʿama al-lahu ʿalayya idh lam akun maʿahum shahīdan
